Title: S6 Ep. 273 Jonathan Borgwing - How Failure Leads Us Closer To Success
Description:
How Failure Leads Us Closer To Success.

This week’s episode is about Jon Borgwing, an Army veteran who shares that it is important to recognize opportunity and take advantage of it when it presents itself. Why? Because you can help people, create impact, and change the world.

 

This week’s episode was fascinating. We discussed how the use of AR, VR, and immersive technologies will be used to accelerate cognitive and educational learning opportunities.

 

Jon’s outlook on failure is positive and upbeat and truly one of the best ways to learn. Failure is based on science and in the world of science, what some see failure as negative it is acceptable and gets us closer to success. We need to embrace how failure can and will be one of our best ways to be a more open way to accelerating learning. Tune in to learn more about the role an instructional designer plays in everyday learning to make it experiential.
